info.text0: Definition before means Ctrl+Cmd+F5 key combination
info.text1: You can check keys codess in 'macOSKeyCodes.json'. Also you can write just F5 instead VK_F5, for more convenience
info.text3: Be care about 'isCaps' and 'isFN' - thats working as trigger, not key-combo. So that 'true' means 'true', 'false' means 'does not matter'
